CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 3, 1945, pg. 17, reads: "Boo! Garbed in traditional fashion, these youngsters indulge in a bit of pre-Halloween fun. Some of them were dressed so weirdly that they frightened themselves.  At least that's what the photographer said. - Courier Photo by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Children in Halloween costumes posed on sidewalk, possibly in front of Lee's Florist shop, Centre Avenue, Hill District
